Posts.Content: Oct 18, 2007 07:36PM ahaha wrote: I didn't have back pain either . . . instead pain on the inside of the upper leg, which everyone thought was arthritis.  It turned out to be deferred pain from a crack in the pubic bone.  Since Feb. I've been on Faslodex and Zometa.  It took at least 3 months of these drugs to reach their optimal effectiveness for me.
